basics.label: Quality Assurance Manager
basics.summary: Outgoing Quality Assurance Manager with 8 years of managerial experience in Aerospace. Committed to high standards of product inspections and customer service with extensive knowledge of EVO & Microsoft office use. Adept at collaborative with various departments for comprehensive quality control. Methodical with superb problem-solving and analytical abilities.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Specifies quality requirements of raw materials with suppliers, records and analyses statistical information, and reports production malfunctions to managers and production supervisors. Inspects products and worker progress throughout production and provides analytical, planning and coordination support on projects as assigned.
highlights: Implemented NADCAP AC7108/1 throughout the facility.
Created and administered FOD Program compliant to NAS412.
